    id="sensor",

    rollup_index="sensor_rollup",
    cron="0 0 * * * *",
    page_size=1000,
    groups={

            "field": "timestamp",
            "fixed_interval": "60m"

            "fields": [

            ]

    },
    metrics=[
        {
            "field": "temperature",

                "min",
